updateSqlList: CREATE TABLE `Aml_Const` (`constNum` VARCHAR(45) NOT NULL,`constName` VARCHAR(200) NOT NULL,PRIMARY KEY (`constNum`))ENGINE = InnoDB;

CREATE TABLE `Aml_Const_Detail` (`auto_id` VARCHAR(45) NOT NULL, `constDetailNum` VARCHAR(45) NOT NULL,`constDetailName` VARCHAR(200) NOT NULL,`constNum` VARCHAR(45) NOT NULL,`constDesc` VARCHAR(2000) NOT NULL,PRIMARY KEY (`auto_id`))ENGINE = InnoDB;
CREATE TABLE Aml_Const (constNum VARCHAR(45) NOT NULL,constName VARCHAR(200) NOT NULL,PRIMARY KEY (constNum))

CREATE TABLE Aml_Const_Detail (auto_id VARCHAR(45) NOT NULL, constDetailNum VARCHAR(45) NOT NULL,constDetailName VARCHAR(200) NOT NULL,constNum VARCHAR(45) NOT NULL,constDesc VARCHAR(2000) NOT NULL,PRIMARY KEY (auto_id))
